title: The Best and Worst of Religion
itunes:title: The Best and Worst of Religion
description: Our first reading for this weekend, taken from the first book of Kings, is one of the most beautiful and memorable passages in the Old Testament. It tells of the prophet Elijah, who heard a tiny, whispering voice, which this was the presence of the Lord.
